pages.text:
Title: L.S. category of the total space in a fibration and k-monomorphisms

Abstract: Let Fι↪Ef↠B be a fibration, we focus on the relation between the homotopy invariants catE, catF and catB. The general formula due to Hardie says that catE⩽(catι+1)·(catf+1)−1; if the fibration is trivial, this upper bound can be replaced by catF+catB. In this paper, we introduce a notion of k-triviality and construct upper bound for catE in terms of k, catι and catf.
